profile:
COMPUTER & NOTEBOOK REPAIRS, UPGRADES, ON-SITE SERVICES

Fujitech is a wholesale distrubutor for computers, blank storage media (CD-R, DVD-R, BD-R, etc) & accessories and also a retail outlet providing PC & Laptop repair services in Thornhill & GTA.

Service offerings include a free no-obligation PC diagnostic and repair services and come with a "No Fix No Pay" Guarantee, which means if they don't fix, you don't pay.

Fujitech does computer Repairs & Upgrades, virus removal, System tune-up, Networking and also sells & installs DVR Security Camera Systems and POS systems.

On-site service to businesses and home users are also provided at reasonable rates.

profile:
COVID-19 UPDATE: We are open and able to fully support all clients requiring tech support. We are following very strict health guidelines during home/office visits while wearing face protection, sanitizing hands before & after visits, and wearing clean clothes & socks daily. We also use the most secure industry-accepted software to help you remotely when possible. We have a healthy inventory of computers & parts and we do not believe in price gouging. 
 
SuperTechTeam offers dependable services at prices that make sense to you. Our technicians are certified and highly experienced to handle your concerns in the most professional manner.
 
We come to your home or business so you never have to lift a finger! 
  
We can help you with your home and business needs including Mac, PC's, iPhone/iPad, Networking, Wifi, Printers, Home entertainment, 1-on-1 Training, and more!
 
Our clients love our quality of work and we strive to ensure each and every one of them is 100% satisfied.
 
Service Area: We service most of the GTA including Toronto, Markham, Richmond Hill, Vaughan, Aurora, Newmarket, Mississauga, and more. If you're not sure, send us a note and we can confirm if we can help you.
  
Call us for a free quote today at 416-840-5813!

profile:
Complete computer check-up
* we will scan your computer for Malware or Virus and anything that is suspected or has the potential to become a problem and fully optimize your system.

 Troubleshooting
* If you have a software or hardware problem, no matter how big or small, let us know and we will help you with figuring out what the problem is a taking the necessary actions to resolve that problem.

 Installations
* Got a new piece of hardware or software and can’t seem to figure out how to install it? Let ACS help by installing that new RAM or your new Office application.

 Repairs
* Have a computer that just doesn’t seem to work anymore? Let ACS take a look and see if we can’t revive that old machine and have it running again!

 Computer consultation
* Want to buy a new computer, but don’t know what to get and don’t want to deal with a pushy salesperson that will try to sell you what he wants you to have? Let ACS offer our experience to ultimately get you the proper PC for your needs.

 Custom built computers – PC only
* Tired of the off-the-shelf PC and want to be able to configure your options yourself? Do you want a machine that is cool to look at, performance tuned, and setup so that upgrades are actually possible? Let ACS build you a computer that will be the envy of your friends.

 Basic web authoring
* Do you need basic modifications to your existing webpages? Or perhaps a new website built from scratch? Let ACS handle your web mastering needs. Please note, requests for web assistance will be addressed on an individual basis, as some requests will require more time than others. Please check the Websites link for examples of some of our web work.
If you would like to discuss pricing or would like to acquire the services of ACS please use our Contact form by following the link on the Navigation bar to the left.
